Articles.Content:
a series on getting science fast and unlocking all of the R&D tech tree.
also creating some space stations and fuel depots,

come and have a look. first few videos are crude, still looking for a good video editor.

KSP R&D in a hurry! 

my YouTube channel is reservation gaming, and I am making a series about KSP gameplay and tutorial, featuring some mods.

I would really appreciate if you guys could tell me what you think. and how to improve. I am a noob!
